const Header = ({ resetArray, reverseArray, setSize, darkMode, setDarkMode, }) => { return (
Operations
resetArray()}> Shuffle
reverseArray()}> Reverse
Select Size
setSize(8)}> 8
setSize(16)}> 16
setSize(32)}> 32
setSize(64)}> 64
setSize(128)}> 128
setSize(256)}> 256
setSize(512)}> 512
setSize(1024)}> 1024
{darkMode ? "Dark" : "Light"}
setDarkMode(!darkMode)}> {darkMode ? "Dark" : "Light"}
); }; export default Header;
